text: The coat of arms of Spain is seen on the Flag of Spain, it composed of six other coat of arms. * The gold castle in a red background, which symbolizes Castile * The red lion in white background, symbolising Le√≥n * The red and yellow stripes of Aragon * The golden chains of Navarre * The flower of Granada * The fleur de lys of Bourbon ==References== Spain Category:National symbols of Spain
title: Coat of arms of Spain
